summary: The module provides functionality for parsing multipart/form-data HTTP requests, handling file uploads and form fields. It defines a MultiPartParser class that streams and parses the request body, separating fields and files into MultiValueDict structures, while managing upload handlers and enforcing size limits. Supporting iterators and utilities handle boundary detection, chunked reading, and stream management.
business_intent: To enable web applications to safely and efficiently process multipart form submissions, including large file uploads, by streaming data, enforcing limits, and providing easy access to parsed fields and files.
